Question: This person hosted the 2001 documentary short, The Making of A Charlie Brown Christmas.
Hints: In 2012, this person guest starred as Jane Marsh, Sue Heck's guidance counselor in the TV series, The Middle.
This person made a guest appearance on the hit television show 30 Rock, in which she played herself.
On September 4, 2007, this person became the new moderator and co-host of The View, replacing Rosie O'Donnell.
